hasMenuItem.name: 4 Legs Fried + Mashed Potato
hasMenuItem.description: Try our delicious 4 chicken legs that are coated in flour, seasoned with our original or spicy seasoning and deep-fried until crispy and golden brown. It offers a mouthwatering combination of crunchy exterior and juicy, tender meat. Enjoyed the popular comfort food with a creamy and fluffy mashed potato and a chilling thirst quenching can of pepsi.

hasMenuItem.name: One Can Dine - Butter chicken Meal
hasMenuItem.description: Indulge in a heavenly feast with butter chicken, fragrant rice, and garlic bread. Tender chicken cooked in a rich and creamy buttery sauce, served alongside fluffy rice that's infused with aromatic flavors. And to complete this irresistible meal, warm, buttery garlic bread that melts in your mouth. It's a symphony of flavors that will leave you craving for more.

hasMenuItem.name: 4 Legs Fried + Mashed Potato
hasMenuItem.description: Try our delicious 4 chicken legs that are coated in flour, seasoned with our original or spicy seasoning and deep-fried until crispy and golden brown. It offers a mouthwatering combination of crunchy exterior and juicy, tender meat. Enjoyed the popular comfort food with a creamy and fluffy mashed potato and a chilling thirst quenching can of pepsi.

hasMenuItem.name: Two Can Dine - Butter Chicken Meal
hasMenuItem.description: Indulge in a heavenly feast with butter chicken, fragrant rice, and garlic bread. Tender chicken cooked in a rich and creamy buttery sauce, served alongside fluffy rice that's infused with aromatic flavors. And to complete this irresistible meal, warm, buttery garlic bread that melts in your mouth. It's a symphony of flavors that will leave you craving for more. Everything mentioned but for two!

review.reviewBody: Veggie wrap tastes amazing. fresh and crispy. this is my go to place for veggie burgers, golgappe and chole kulche. clean and welcoming environment with happy greetings from owners.
Crispy Chicken Burger with Crispy Fries I love this.
